vision.notes: Sensory capabilities of Phascolosomatidae are generally understudied. Vision is likely present but not confirmed in the provided data.

chemoreception.notes: Chemoreception is likely present in marine worms for food detection and environmental sensing, but this is not specified in the provided data.

mechanoreception.notes: Mechanoreception via epidermal receptors is likely present for detecting substrate vibrations and tactile stimuli, but this is not specified in the provided data.
